abstract.title: Abstract
abstract.para: This guide provides web services available to integrate CloudForms Management Engine with external applications. This guide details the CFME SOAP API.

formalpara.title: IMPORTANT
formalpara.para: The SOAP API will be deprecated in the next major CloudForms release after CloudForms 3.2 (CFME 5.4). The CloudForms REST API v2 now provides parity with the SOAP API, and Red Hat recommends using the REST API for all integration projects. Technical publications will be available to aid transition from the SOAP API to the REST API prior to deprecation.
